Floor
Class FloorListenerImpl

java.lang.Object
  Floor.FloorListenerImpl

public class FloorListenerImpl
extends java.lang.Object

Class that allows those that implement it to become listeners. Changes in the floor of the elevator are reported here and any listeners are notified of the change

Author:
Shabbir Vijapura/Harmeet Masuta

didReachDefaultFloorWithAdditionalRequests

public boolean didReachDefaultFloorWithAdditionalRequests(int elevatorNum)
Public boolean function that is called once the elevator reaches the default floor

Parameters:
elevatorNum - - Which elevator reached the default floor
Returns:
True if there are pending requests and otherwise False
